content.raw:
Sweet. As it does on mine. Pretty strange that it's different with the same version of pyqt on the two computers you checked. Perhaps your font size is different on the two hosts, is one high DPI or something?

In any case, we can just merge this an not worry about it. In general my experience seems to be that changing things with stylesheets has more side effects than with regular imperative Qt, so it’s preferable anyway.
